summary: Completed testing of Flowitec Go & Grow LMS. Backend APIs are 100% functional, but frontend has critical authentication and mixed content security issues preventing full functionality.

integration_issues.issue: JWT tokens not persisting across page navigations, causing automatic logouts
integration_issues.details: Users get logged out when navigating between pages. Authentication works initially but token is not maintained in localStorage/sessionStorage properly.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend making HTTP requests to HTTPS backend causing browser blocks
integration_issues.details: Console error: 'Mixed Content: The page at 'https://course-registry-5.preview.emergentagent.com/dashboard' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint 'http://flowitec-lms.preview.emergentagent.com/api/certificates/'. This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS.'

passed_tests: Backend: All 16 API endpoints (100% success rate)
Backend: Course, module, lesson, quiz CRUD operations
Backend: Progress tracking and quiz submission
Frontend: Initial page load and rendering
Frontend: Registration form and user creation

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (basic functionality works but critical navigation issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix two major frontend issues: 1) Authentication token persistence - JWT tokens are not being stored/retrieved properly causing users to be logged out on page navigation. 2) Mixed content security - Some API calls are still using HTTP instead of HTTPS endpoints. Both issues prevent users from accessing course management, enrollment, and other core functionality after initial login.
